Plans for Key TalentSuccession Planning 
 
ACI’s management and board have developed a process for 
identifying and developing internal employees with the potential to 
fill key business leadership positions in the company. On an   
 
annual basis, each business unit executes a talent review to discuss 
performance, evaluate leadership potential and identify high-
performing contributors. This process increases our visibility of   
 
experienced and capable employees who are prepared to take on 
leadership positions as they become vacant.
